greeting: Hi! Thanks for calling Sylvan Learning of Ballwin. I’m your virtual assistant. How can I help you regarding your child's education?

questions.answer: Pricing depends on your child’s needs. We always start with a Sylvan Insight Assessment to create a custom plan. Right now, the assessment is just $49. Want to book one?
Hi there! Just in case we get cut off, could I get your name and phone number?
I can definitely help with that. What days or times tend to work best for you?
We cover it all, from elementary math up to Calculus. We'll build a custom plan just for them. Shall we start with the $49 checkup to pinpoint their needs?
We help with all of that—comprehension, fluency, vocabulary, you name it. The best first step is a quick assessment. Would you like to schedule one?
We do expert SAT and ACT prep. Our students see huge score jumps! We even have free practice exams. Want me to see when we can fit you in for one?
Usually, we're here Monday through Thursday afternoons, and Saturday mornings. I can have a director confirm specific openings for you if you'd like?
We're over at 14248 G Manchester Rd in Ballwin. Super easy to find!
Of course. Let me get you to a director who can help. One sec!
We actually guarantee results—our students typically see up to 3x more growth than their peers. A director can explain exactly how that works for your child's grade level.
Our Insight Assessment is great—it shows us exactly where your child is strong and where they have gaps. It's only $49 right now. Do you want to book it?

objections.too_expensive: I hear you. A lot of families start with the $49 checkup just to see what's going on before deciding anything. It's a low-risk way to get answers.
objections.needs_referral: Every child is so different. That's why the assessment is key—it tells us if we're even the right fit. It's just $49 to get a clear picture.

default: I'm not 100% sure on that one, but I can have a director give you a call to explain. Would that be okay?
